inclusion.criterion: Histological or cytological diagnosis of adenocarcinoma of the prostate
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evaluations at 4 week-intervals. Disease assessments required at the milestone Day 60 assessment (expected to occur after 8 weeks of treatment and prior to Day 1, Week 9) and at 16, 24, 32, 40, and 48 weeks (if applicable) or until documented disease progression.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has symptoms consistent with a serious illness, but no underlying disease is mentioned. He is not on any medications.
